channel.title: CVE Feed for ESTsoft -- Alyac
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESTsoft -- Alyac

item.title: CVE-2022-21147|2024-09-16T17:28:13.223Z -- estsoft -- alyac
item.description: An out of bounds read vulnerability exists in the malware scan functionality of ESTsoft Alyac 2.5.7.7. A specially-crafted PE file can trigger this vulnerability to cause denial of service and termination of malware scan. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
